settings.heading: Learn More
settings.content:
Welcome to our X-Large Afghan Rugs Collection at Chargul, where grandeur and tradition meet. Our X-Large Afghan rugs are meticulously hand knotted by skilled Afghan artisans, using 100% wool to create expansive and luxurious pieces. These rugs are perfect for making a bold and elegant statement in your home, adding warmth and sophistication to large living rooms, open floor plans, and grand entryways.

Heritage and Craftsmanship

Each X-Large Afghan rug in our collection is a masterpiece of Afghan cultural heritage. Featuring intricate patterns and vibrant colors, these rugs are crafted using traditional techniques and natural dyes. The designs reflect centuries of weaving traditions, passed down through generations, ensuring that each piece is unique and tells a story of its own.

Ideal for Spacious Settings

Our X-Large Afghan rugs are designed to transform and enhance the decor of expansive spaces:

  • Living Rooms: Serve as a majestic centerpiece, adding color, texture, and warmth to your grand living space.
  • Dining Rooms: Place under a large dining table to create an elegant and inviting dining experience.
  • Bedrooms: Use as a luxurious base in your master bedroom to add comfort and style.
  • Open Floor Plans: Define and beautify large open areas with a rug that brings both sophistication and coziness.

Why Choose X-Large Afghan Rugs from Chargul?

  1. Authenticity: We source our rugs directly from Afghan weavers, ensuring you receive an authentic and ethically made piece.
  2. Quality: Our rugs are made from 100% wool, known for its durability and sumptuous texture.
  3. Unique Designs: Each rug is hand knotted, offering distinct patterns and vibrant colors that are one-of-a-kind.

Our Commitment

At Chargul, we are dedicated to promoting and preserving the art of Afghan rug weaving. By choosing a rug from our collection, you are not only enhancing your home with a beautiful piece of art but also supporting Afghan artisans and helping to sustain their craft.

Explore More:

  • Discover our All Afghan Rugs for our full range of options.
  • Learn about the art and history of Afghan rugs on our blog.
  • Contact us for personalized assistance in selecting the perfect rug for your space.

Add to Cart and transform your spacious living area with the timeless beauty of an X-Large Afghan rug from Chargul.
